tool_description: Assigns comprehensive scores to potential reviewers based on expertise relevance, availability, review quality history, and other factors.

reviewer_ids.description: List of reviewer identifiers to score

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All provided arrays must have the same length as reviewer_ids.
Invalid score values: All scores must be numeric values between 0 and 1.
Invalid weight parameters: diversity_weight, experience_weight, and timeliness_weight must be between 0 and 1.
Missing required scores: expertise_scores array is required and cannot be empty.
Too many reviewers: Limit to 100 reviewers for processing efficiency.
usage: Provide reviewer_ids and expertise_scores as minimum input. Add influence_scores, availability_flags, and quality_scores for more comprehensive scoring. Adjust weight parameters to prioritize different factors.

composite_scores.description: Final composite scores for each reviewer

ranked_reviewers.description: Reviewer IDs sorted by composite score (highest first)

score_breakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of how each score was calculated

scoring_summary.description: Summary of scoring methodology and top recommendations
